website_summaries.verdict: While the design could be better, the iXpand Memory Case is one of the only solutions for expanding iPhone storage.
pros: The iXpand Memory Case has built-in storage to expand the capacity of an iPhone 6 or 6S
The bundled application makes it easy to transfer photos and video from from your phone's internal memory
cons: The port placement is awkward and the case itself is bulky, especially when the optional battery is attached

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this.
customer_reviews.text: This is supposed to be 32 gigs of additional storage and the frame for a battery you have to purchase separately. The frame is sturdy but the memory does not work. After downloading the app, it says no connection. Ugh. It’s getting hard to find cases with built battery. This will have to work for now... to bad you can’t buy a mophie case for the 6s anymore...
customer_reviews.author: daniel anderson

customer_reviews.title: Also the case breaks very easy. I dropped it on carpet and when I ...
customer_reviews.text: This product stopped working after about two weeks of use. The case kept saying that it was "not connecting" to my phone and would not let me download any of my music onto the app. Also the case breaks very easy. I dropped it on carpet and when I picked it up there was a crack about 2 inches long. And the top of the case is supposed to be removable so you can take it off of the phone, but after you take it off a couple times it becomes loose and will then keep following off all the time. DO NOT GET THIS PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carson Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Made of very cheap material the organization of the app you use to store photos and music on your case is terrible. Do not by do
customer_reviews.text: This case is trash after 3 months of having it the top broke off and the bottom cracked and exposed the wires that lead to the changing port. Made of very cheap material the organization of the app you use to store photos and music on your case is terrible. Do not by does not offer protection as a case and the backup is basically the same as backin the pictures onto your computer.
customer_reviews.author: The One

customer_reviews.title: its BS
customer_reviews.text: its not supported anymore by SanDisk it said in the accompanying information / the battery was NOT included but all information and pictures before I bought it showed different and didn't mention that / its only for non DRM protected music and for pictures to store so not really "adding" memory in a normal way for other apps etc.. / got to install their (unsupported) app too before it will work so I said NO lyers and send it straight back with ups one month ago ...and still waiting for my refund too !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Outdated app unable to use - returned
customer_reviews.text: The item SanDisk iXpand was returned as the app needed to activate the memory is no longer available, this is outdated
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Good way to expand my iphone’s memory.
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing to dislike about the SanDiskiXpand. I bought it to expand memory in my iPhone 6.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie

customer_reviews.title: It does not have a good connection and does not want to charge correctly
customer_reviews.text: Case is ok. Did not order with the battery however was very awkward without it. I ordered the battery later and I'm very displeased with it. It does not have a good connection and does not want to charge correctly. It just beeps back-and-forth when it tries to connect. Have not figured out how to transfer music to case. But pictures work well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase
customer_reviews.text: The battery continues running even while locked. I had my phone on 100% juice before I went to bed. It was locked. When I woke up it was dead. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Harris

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work anymore
customer_reviews.text: Since June 28, 2019 you cannot download the necessary app SanDisk iXpand Memory case. And without this app you cannot connect the case with the iPhone. Waisting time, waisting money. Unfortunately I found out that issue too late.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon-Kunde

customer_reviews.title: but I should have read the fine print. Most of my storage is from the ...
customer_reviews.text: Very interesting product, but I should have read the fine print. Most of my storage is from the Spotify songs that are available offline on my iPhone. This product only works with iTunes music, photos, and videos, and has nothing to do w/ other apps
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't even give this 1 star. This case is terrible. It drains battery life, and phone will not charge correctly because the cord doesn't connect correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Not working properly... the transfer data from ...
customer_reviews.text: Not working properly... the transfer data from the iXpand to the IPhone is via Bluetooth and not by the lightning connection and it’s disconnect. After 3 days of trying to use I put it back to box Amazon give me the money back...
customer_reviews.author: Idan

customer_reviews.title: Connectivity is very slow between phone and case, it ...
customer_reviews.text: Connectivity is very slow between phone and case, it also drains the phone battery when using the app. The case player crash frequently when music is playing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice memory expansion for Iphone 6 Backup!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is very nice and actually a decently sturdy case for the Iphone 6.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Cook

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: produit pour les américains qui ne fonctionne pas en europe, je cherche à le revendre ...
customer_reviews.author: Quentin P.

customer_reviews.title: Lost top piece of the case and it very easy to come off
customer_reviews.text: Lost top piece of the case and it very easy to come off, also phone does not save app storage which is kind of usuless
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it out of USA
customer_reviews.text: The app to use it is not available in my local apple store (Spain, Europe)
customer_reviews.author: Luis F. Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: its a great invent but made the phone bigger its ok
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surely one of the best product of its kind
customer_reviews.text: Surely one of the best product of its kind. Starting from the build quality to its functionality, the product stands out in all the departments. Just plug it into your iPhone and download the iXpand Case app, and you are ready to rock with a bigger storage space on offer. Even without the battery pack, the bumper cover alone provides very good protection to the phone, and most importantly even on fitting the case, the size of the phone remains comfortable to hold on to and use with one hand. Overall, this is certainly the product which any iPhone user will look forward to get his hands on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The worst case ever
customer_reviews.text: The worst case ever. It makes ur mobiles look like I phone 6+. I hate it + I did not find the free code to download the software inside. its not easy to install at all. Do not buy it
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't provide the storage solution I needed
customer_reviews.text: Did not provide the impact on storage I was hoping for. To see a full review check out [...]
customer_reviews.author: C.Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality; EXTREMELY cheap!
customer_reviews.text: It sounds good, the branding states some really good features but, it's EXTREMELY cheap, it does not feels like it's worth what you are paying. But it is a good thing to have more memory in a case, bet the plastic kills it all😕😕
customer_reviews.author: Elias B.

customer_reviews.title: I like it. I also bought the extended battery that ...
customer_reviews.text: Other than the weird bump on the back and the case being a bit slippery, I like it. I also bought the extended battery that clips to the case. They work well together, but make for a thick casing.
customer_reviews.author: Bacbldr

customer_reviews.title: You have to turn Bluetooth on for the file transfer ...
customer_reviews.text: You have to turn Bluetooth on for the file transfer. Not as fast as expected. Iphone battery drain fast after connecting this case
customer_reviews.author: Madhusanka Mahesh

customer_reviews.title: I did not like the product
customer_reviews.text: I did not like the product, because for it to work you have to enable bluetooth, which makes the battery runs out quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo Zipitria

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It literally stopped communicating with my phone after a week, and the app is extremely buggy.
customer_reviews.author: Dj 5quar3

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic case.
customer_reviews.text: I've never been a fan of big bulky cases and would have bought this one for it's slim design alone. The fact that I can ad 32gb of storage to my paltry 16gb iphone 6 is icing on the cake. It's simple, easy to put one, and sleek. The app needed to use the case effectively is intuitive and friendly. I love that I can now take photos with my iPhone and not have to pick and choose which ones I want to keep. This is the best phone case I've had, to the point I recommended it to all my team members as well.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Webb

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: i received it and it was missing the top piece.
customer_reviews.author: Javier Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: The case stopped connecting to WIndows
customer_reviews.text: This case has completely stopped connecting and interfacing with any windows laptop via the micro USB cable. This makes the case useless as I can't get any information off it anymore.I have looked all over the internet and no solutions are available for this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Rohan Kumar

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Worked for about a day and broke. Save your money...
customer_reviews.author: Niem.

product_meta.title: SanDisk iXpand 32GB Memory Case for iPhone 6/6s - Retail Packaging - Red
product_meta.description: Upgrade your phone by upgrading your case. The iXpand Memory Case delivers 32GB, 64GB or 128GB of built-in storage for your iPhone 6 or iPhone 6s. Keep taking pictures, listening to music, watching videos, playing games and doing all of the other things you do with your iPhone 6 or iPhone 6s.
feature_bullets: Memory case with 32GB, 64GB or 128GB of built in storage
Instantly create more space for photos, videos and music
Designed with hard plastic outside and soft rubber inside to help protect your iPhone
Use the app to shoot, save and view photos and video directly from the case

specifications.Customer Reviews: 2.2 out of 5 stars70 ratings2.2 out of 5 stars
